DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate pulmonary function respiratory muscle strength group elderly woman hypertension respiratory muscle training .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Respiratory Muscle Training Elderly Hypertensive Women With Respiratory Muscle Weakness
DOC.detailed_description: It respiratory muscle training use Threshold 5 week , load 30 % maximal inspiratory pressure obtain manometer 30 minute daily . Furthermore , assessment include : test 6-minute walk , quality life questionnaire , MINICHAL , IPAQ short version , manometer spirometry .
DOC.criteria: diagnosis hypertension control antihypertensive ; age 60 80 year ; absence dementia cognitive impairment limit test ; absence recent myocardial infarction ; absence musculoskeletal limitation limit test ; availability time training day . clinical instability ; inability perform test .
